name: raclette
content:
Add to word list

a Swiss dish that involves heating cheese until it melts and eating it with potatoes and pickles: Restaurants here often provide raclette evenings for parties of diners. A modern way of serving raclette involves an electric table-top grill with small pans in which you can heat slices of raclette cheese.
(also Raclette) a type of cheese that is used to make this dish: Raclette is a classic melting cheese with a nutty flavour. 150g Raclette or other melting cheese
